org.jclouds.cloudstack.features

Interface SecurityGroupApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SecurityGroupClient

    public interface SecurityGroupApi
extends SecurityGroupClient
    Provides synchronous access to CloudStack Account features.

    Note that this class is transitionary and will fully replace SecurityGroupClient in 1.7.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
    See Also:
